Uses of Class
ch.hszt.connectfour.model.board.GameBoardSlotCollection

Packages that use GameBoardSlotCollection
ch.hszt.connectfour.model.board This package contains an abstract model of the game board. 
 

Uses of GameBoardSlotCollection in ch.hszt.connectfour.model.board
 

Subclasses of GameBoardSlotCollection in ch.hszt.connectfour.model.board
 class GameBoardColumn
          Encapsulates a model-based column on the game board.
 class GameBoardDiagonal
          Represents a model-based diagonal on the GameBoard.
 class GameBoardLine
          Represents any kind of line on the GameBoard.
 class GameBoardRow
          Represents a model-based row in the GameBoard
 

Methods in ch.hszt.connectfour.model.board that return types with arguments of type GameBoardSlotCollection
 List<GameBoardSlotCollection> GameBoard.getAll()
          Returns all relevant GameBoard elements (columns, rows, diagonals) represented by the list of GameBoardSlotCollection items.
 List<GameBoardSlotCollection> GameBoard.getColumns()
          Returns all columns of the GameBoard as list of GameBoardSlotCollection items.
 List<GameBoardSlotCollection> GameBoard.getDiagonals()
          Returns all valid (i.e. consisting of >= 4 GameBoardSlot) diagonals of the GameBoard as list of GameBoardSlotCollection items.
 List<GameBoardSlotCollection> GameBoard.getRows()
          Returns all rows of the GameBoard as list of GameBoardSlotCollection items.
